name: Timelapsecam
body: # Timelapse camera *** Author: * David Kedves License: * GPL v2.0 About: Whith this application you can make timelapse videos using your webcameras (or any v4l compatible device). This project contains two subprojects: * a script which does the image capture and the video creation * a small GUI to make the configuration and start the video creation script Debian packaging was made for Ubuntu GNU/Linux distributions.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
